# Vertexes of each solid, triangular block available in all materials
# Made by hand by looking at TEST_BLOCKS.blueprint, generated by gen_test_blueprints.py
# Each row is a vertical slice of the block vertices at rotation 0, encoded as top left, top right, bottom left, bottom right
